entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
